Name: In And Out Martini
Instructions: Gently SHAKE vermouth with ice. Strain and discard vermouth to leave the ice in the shaker coated with vermouth. Add gin, SHAKE again with coated ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: A well-diluted shaken Dry Martini. However, seems like a waste of good vermouth.
History: This drinks origin is unknown but former U.S. President Richard Nixon is said to have preferred his Martini made this way. Also see our Dry Martini page.
Nutrition: One serving of In And Out Martini contains 183 calories
